GSD.description:
ext4: fix BUG_ON() when directory entry has invalid rec_len

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.224 by commit 2fa24d0274fbf913b56ee31f15bc01168669d909. For more details please see the references link.
